stories.text: I would appreciate any recommendations. I am looking for a quality optical CD/DVD drive. I have had two different drives so far but each broke after just after two years of modest use. I have never had this problem when those drives were still built into computers. It seems all drives are of poor quality.
stories.title: Ask HN: Are there any good external CD/DVD drives?

stories.text:
In my experience, HN users tend to have incredibly specialized interests. I'm curious about what newsletters are out there that deliver a depth of specialized knowledge?

For me, it doesn't get better than 'The Prepared' and the 'Future of Trucks' newsletters. Both provide a window into technicalities that I wouldn't otherwise think about in fields that I'm broadly interested in.

https://theprepared.org/ https://www.trucks.vc/newsletter
stories.title: Ask HN: What hyper-focused industry newsletters do you enjoy?
Facebook vs. TikTok: Will Every Tech Company Become a Political Campaign?
EasyPodcasts: A Podcasts Agregator for Cubans

stories.text:
Some time ago, I received an invitation to meet a senator I had written to[1], should members of the public be allowed to meet state representatives this way? It could unlock improper relationships such as a member of the public could slip the state representative something to sweeten their relationship.

* Should representatives be allowed to entertain and meet members of the public?

[1] https://ibb.co/8BGXf79
stories.title: Poll: Should state representatives be allowed to entertain members of public?
